name: Truth Or Dare? - Group Game
description:
This Truth or Dare game contains hundreds of the best Truth and Dares. To get a Dare all you have to do is swipe right. To get a Truth or you have to do is swipe left.

There are 4 different game modes in this game:
1) Normal
2) Party
3) Extreme - this game mode contains dirty dares and should only be played be adults ages
4) Couples - this game mode has been designed for players in relationships and also contains adult content

Features:
- Over 1000 Truth and Dares questions
- Play with an unlimited amount of players
- 4 different game modes

What are you waiting for? Grab some friends and start playing the ultimate Truth or Dare party game!
